title: ATypI is go!
content:
Wanted to send a quick post from Saint Petersburg. The conference is underway!

Flickr group set up - [http://www.flickr.com/groups/862698@N20/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201141207/http:/www.flickr.com/groups/862698@N20/ "http://www.flickr.com/groups/862698@N20/")

 [‹ The Craft of Design](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201141207/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49470 "Go to previous forum topic") [Indesign CS3 Windows -\> Mac? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201141207/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49654 "Go to next forum topic")
author: sii

comments.content:
I’m trying to keep my [blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201141207/http:/www.typografism.se/) updated. If you find jokes about people foreheads being glued to keyboards funny (supported by photographic evidence) that’s where you go. Hilarity will ensue.
